mdRecord.dcterms:title: A Treatise on the study of the law: containing, directions to students / written by those celebrated lawyers, orators, and statesmen, the Lords Mansfield, Ashburton, and Thurlow, in a series of letters to their respective young friends; with notes, and additions by the editor
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dunning, John Baron Ashburton, 1731-1783
Mansfield, William Murray Earl of, 1705-1793
Thurlow, Edward Thurlow Baron, 1731-1806
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed for Harrison, Cluse and Co.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "These letters appeared in the European magazine for March 1791; and February, March, April, and May, 1792."--P. [1]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law--Study and teaching--Great Britain.
